name: Rollin'WithTheDDaily
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Learn from stylist, author, educator, Paul Mitchell Focus salon owner and entrepreneur Sonny D as he shares insights into the business of the beauty industry. Every stylist needs to be part artist, part entrepreneur, and this is where you can come sharpen your skills. Here we will hack topics like finance, growing a business, being an owner, developing a winning mindset and much more.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
